title: Webpack browser schema for Build Facade.

___ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.

___input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

___inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

___bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

___lazy.description: If the bundle will be lazy loaded.

___maximumWarning.description: The maximum threshold for warning relative to the baseline.

___warning.description: The threshold for warning relative to the baseline (min & max).

___maximumError.description: The maximum threshold for error relative to the baseline.

___error.description: The threshold for error relative to the baseline (min & max).

___minimumError.description: The minimum threshold for error relative to the baseline.

___minimumWarning.description: The minimum threshold for warning relative to the baseline.

___verbose.description: Adds more details to output logging.

___deleteOutputPath.description: Delete the output path before building.

___lazyModules.description: List of additional NgModule files that will be lazy loaded. Lazy router modules will be discovered automatically.

___i18nFile.description: Localization file to use for i18n.

___outputHashing.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

___profile.description: Output profile events for Chrome profiler.

___styles.description: Global styles to be included in the build.

___inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

___bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

___lazy.description: If the bundle will be lazy loaded.

___buildOptimizer.description: Enables '@angular-devkit/build-optimizer' optimizations when using the 'aot' option.

___deployUrl.description: URL where files will be deployed.

___es5BrowserSupport.x-deprecated: This will be determined from the list of supported browsers specified in the 'browserslist' file.

___webWorkerTsConfig.description: TypeScript configuration for Web Worker modules.

___crossOrigin.description: Define the crossorigin attribute setting of elements that provide CORS support.

___rebaseRootRelativeCssUrls.description: Change root relative URLs in stylesheets to include base HREF and deploy URL. Use only for compatibility and transition. The behavior of this option is non-standard and will be removed in the next major release.

___scripts.description: Global scripts to be included in the build.

___inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

___bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

___lazy.description: If the bundle will be lazy loaded.

oneOf.description: The path of a file to use for the application's HTML index. The filename of the specified path will be used for the generated file and will be created in the root of the application's configured output path.

___output.description: The output path of the application's generated HTML index file. The full provided path will be used and will be considered relative to the application's configured output path.

___input.description: The path of a file to use for the application's generated HTML index.

___index.description: Configures the generation of the application's HTML index.

___aot.description: Build using Ahead of Time compilation.

___extractCss.description: Extract css from global styles into css files instead of js ones.

___resourcesOutputPath.description: The path where style resources will be placed, relative to outputPath.

___preserveSymlinks.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules.

___serviceWorker.description: Generates a service worker config for production builds.

___ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.

___input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

___skipAppShell.description: Flag to prevent building an app shell.

___tsConfig.description: The full path for the TypeScript configuration file, relative to the current workspace.

___scripts.description: Enables optimization of the scripts output.

___styles.description: Enables optimization of the styles output.

___optimization.description: Enables optimization of the build output.

___namedChunks.description: Use file name for lazy loaded chunks.

___main.description: The full path for the main entry point to the app, relative to the current workspace.

___subresourceIntegrity.description: Enables the use of subresource integrity validation.

___poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

___extractLicenses.description: Extract all licenses in a separate file.

___i18nMissingTranslation.description: How to handle missing translations for i18n.

___budgets.description: Budget thresholds to ensure parts of your application stay within boundaries which you set.

___maximumWarning.description: The maximum threshold for warning relative to the baseline.

___warning.description: The threshold for warning relative to the baseline (min & max).

___maximumError.description: The maximum threshold for error relative to the baseline.

___error.description: The threshold for error relative to the baseline (min & max).

___minimumError.description: The minimum threshold for error relative to the baseline.

___minimumWarning.description: The minimum threshold for warning relative to the baseline.

___stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors.

___includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to project root.

___i18nFormat.description: Format of the localization file specified with --i18n-file.

___forkTypeChecker.description: Run the TypeScript type checker in a forked process.

___hidden.description: Output sourcemaps used for error reporting tools.

___polyfills.description: The full path for the polyfills file, relative to the current workspace.

___showCircularDependencies.description: Show circular dependency warnings on builds.

___statsJson.description: Generates a 'stats.json' file which can be analyzed using tools such as 'webpack-bundle-analyzer'.

___commonChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

___progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

___fileReplacements.description: Replace files with other files in the build.

___baseHref.description: Base url for the application being built.

___vendorChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing only vendor libraries.

___outputPath.description:
The full path for the new output directory, relative to the current workspace.

By default, writes output to a folder named dist/ in the current project.
